meanings.sent1: The little jackanape kept playing pranks on his friends.
meanings.sent2: The teacher scolded the jackanape for disrupting the class.
meanings.sent3: The jackanape thought it was funny to hide his friend's backpack.
meanings.sent4: The mischievous jackanape's antics never failed to entertain everyone.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the jackanape's tricks, for he is always up to something.

meanings.sent1: The arrogant jackanape boasted about his accomplishments.
meanings.sent2: Everyone found the jackanape's attitude off-putting.
meanings.sent3: The jackanape strutted around as if he owned the place.
meanings.sent4: His behavior earned him the reputation of being a jackanape.
meanings.sent5: The conceited jackanape believed he was superior to everyone else.
